Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.programmingchronicles.tdd</groupId>
  <artifactId>tdd-lesson-4</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.programmingchronicles.tdd:tdd-lesson-4:pom:1.0-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.programmingchronicles.tdd" name="tdd-lesson-4" rev="1.0-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="tdd-lesson-4" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.programmingchronicles.tdd', module='tdd-lesson-4', version='1.0-SNAPSHOT')
)

Grails

compile 'com.programmingchronicles.tdd:tdd-lesson-4:1.0-SNAPSHOT'

Leiningen

[com.programmingchronicles.tdd/tdd-lesson-4 "1.0-SNAPSHOT"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.programmingchronicles.tdd" %% "tdd-lesson-4" % "1.0-SNAPSHOT"
